title: Exploring the Image of Life
content: Life Design is dedicated to promoting holistic success and well-being in all dimensions of human life. This post explores the spiritual, emotional, and physical aspects of our framework.
author: Life Design Team

title: Orthodoxy and Human Existence
content: Discover how Orthodox principles can guide personal growth and community harmony. This post delves into the integration of spiritual wisdom and practical life design.
author: Life Design Team

title: Engineering a Balanced Life
content: Learn how engineering principles can be applied to create a balanced and fulfilling life. This post combines technical precision with human-centered design.
author: Life Design Team
